ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Post about lvl 49 song
ygData.msgSnippet: as slow as experience goes at 51 (and each level after is supposed to be harder than the last) i doubt i or a lot of others will ever see most of the 51+
ygData.messageBody:
as slow as experience goes at 51 (and each level after is supposed to be
harder than the last) i doubt i or a lot of others will ever see most of the
51+ songs. i think i can make it to level 52, but if 52 is that much harder
than 51 and so on, i'm never going to make 60.

Shada Powa, L51 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> It's looking at this time that there might not be a level 49 song.
> Geoff poured a bunch of good ideas into the 51+ songs. We would
> however be willing to entertain a discussion on this though.
>
> -Gordon
